page.title: 11Recreation Ground Wimbish
page.content: The recreation ground is to be found behind the Council houses in Tye Green (grid ref:055902355). It is about 3 hectares in area. It provides pitches and a pavilion for the village cricket team which plays friendly matches against other local teams as well as for the local football team which is a member of the North West Essex League.There is a set of swings,a slide and a see-saw for the younger children.It is also the venue for the biennial Village Fete.On the S.W. side there is a row of 9 oak trees which were planted in 1949 in memory of the men of Wimbish who were killed in the 1939-45 war.
